text: The 1997 Primera B season was the 46th completed season of the Primera B de Chile. ==Torneo Apertura== Everton became the tournament’s champion after beating Rangers in the tie-breaker final. ==Torneo Clausura== Deportes Iquique was tournament’s champion. ==Annual table== ==References== ==External links== * RSSSF 1997 Category:Primera B de Chile seasons Primera B
title: 1997 Primera B de Chile season
